<element id="0" name="Title" label="Title" type="1" flags="1111111111111111111111000001111000000000000011110011000000000000">
<description >Enter your title</description> </element> <element id="1" name="RSSFeed" label="RSSFeed" type="6" flags="1111100000000000000000000000000000000000000011000000000000000000">
<description >The Url for the Remote RSS</description> </element> <element id="2" name="RSSFeedXSL" label="RSSFeedXSL" type="6" flags="1111100000000000000000000000000000000000000011000000000000000000">
<description >Allow user to enter the url for the xsl style sheet to be used to transform the feed. (Optional)</description> </element> <element id="3" name="Numbertodisplay" label="Number of items to display from the feed" type="6" flags="1111100000000000000000000000000000000000000011000000000000000000">
<description >Allow user to enter the number of items from the feed to display. This is optional and if blank will result in all items being displayed</description> </element>

head.title: CIT | Middle Market Business-Commercial Loans, Financial Services
head.script: var title = "CIT | Middle Market Business-Commercial Loans, Financial Services";

meta.name: Description
meta.content: CIT Group provides business loans for middle market business, financial services-solutions, financing solutions worldwide. Small business lending, loans.
meta.script: var description = "CIT Group provides business loans for middle market business, financial services-solutions, financing solutions worldwide. Small business lending, loans.";

div.h4:
2012 U.S. Commercial Real Estate
Financing Outlook

h3.br: Matt Galligan, Group Head, CIT Real Estate Finance

div.h3: Ray Quinlan, Executive Vice President, Banking, CIT Group Inc.

div.h4: Learn more about our Corporate Finance expertise in these areas:
Learn more about our Transportation Finance expertise in these areas:

p.p: For over 100 years, CIT has provided lending, leasing & advisory services to small and middle market businesses.
CIT Outlook Series | Executive Insight Series |Executive Spotlights | Case Studies | Corporate Citizenship | Corporate Governance

span.style: FONT-FAMILY: 'Calibri','sans-serif'; COLOR: #1f497d; FONT-SIZE: 11pt; mso-ascii-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-fareast-font-family: Calibri; mso-fareast-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-hansi-theme-font: minor-latin; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-bidi-theme-font: minor-bidi; mso-themecolor: dark2; mso-ansi-language: EN-US; mso-fareast-language: EN-US; mso-bidi-language: AR-SA

p.p:
Corporate Finance |Small Business Lending |Trade Finance | Transportation Finance |Vendor Finance | Worldwide
CIT Features:
CIT Executive Spotlight Series: Matt Galligan, Group Head, CIT Real Estate Finance, discusses the 2012 U.S. Commercial Real Estate Financing Outlook.
CIT Executive Insights Series: Ray Quinlan, Executive Vice President, Banking, CIT Group Inc. discusses how online banking is ripe for growth.
CIT Bank Savings: Open a CIT Savings Account. Deposit more. Save more. Start Saving.

p.ul:
Jun 05, 2012
CIT Appoints Jonathan A. Lucas President of CIT Trade Finance
Jun 05, 2012
CIT Announces John F. Daly to Retire as President of CIT Trade Finance
